AI Description: The Biostrings package in R provides efficient manipulation of biological strings, including DNA and RNA sequences. It offers a wide range of functions for string matching, reverse complement, translation, and many other biological sequence-related operations.
Core Features: Efficient Manipulation Of Biological Strings, String Matching & Searching, Reverse Complement Generation, Translation Of Sequences, Support For DNA & RNA Sequences
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Biological Sequences, Sequence Analysis, Computational Biology
